pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pygfried.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pygfried)# PygfriedCPython extension of [siegfried], a signature-based file format identificationtool written in Go.No animals were harmed in the making of this extension.## Usage```$ pip install pygfried$ python -q>>> import pygfried>>> pygfried.version()'1.9.1'>>> pygfried.identify("/bin/ls")'fmt/690'```[siegfried]: https://www.itforarchivists.com/siegfried
